subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: HOUSTON, July 12 (AP) — The Houston Astros acquired third baseman Aubrey Huff from the Tampa Bay Devil Rays for two minor league prospects on Wednesday with the hope that Huff can help revive the Astros’ offense.
snippet: HOUSTON, July 12 (AP) — The Houston Astros acquired third baseman Aubrey Huff from the Tampa Bay Devil Rays for two minor league prospects on Wednesday with the hope that Huff can help revive the Astros’ offense.
